trans-unit.source: Specifies a property or field to update or a method to run using the CodeDom types.
trans-unit.target: 속성 또는 필드 CodeDom 형식을 사용 하 여 실행할 메서드나 업데이트할을 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction"></xref> class using a <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction"> </xref> 클래스 사용을 <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> specifying the action to perform.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> 수행할 동작을 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction"></xref> class using a <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction"> </xref> 클래스 사용을 <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> specifying the action to perform.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"> </xref> 수행할 동작을 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep copy of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 현재의 전체 복사본을 만들고 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> that is identical to this instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> 하는이 인스턴스와 동일 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the code statement specifying the action to perform.
trans-unit.target: 수행할 작업을 지정 하 여 코드 문을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> specifying the action to perform.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"> </xref> 수행할 동작을 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two object instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 개체 인스턴스가 같은지 여부를 결정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>현재 <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> 와 비교할 개체</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>개체가 동일 하면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 실행 된 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> 사용 하 여 지정 된 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref> context used to execute the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"> </xref> 컨텍스트를 실행 하는 데는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스에 대 한 해시 코드를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스에 대 한 해시 코드입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the fields and properties updated by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 필드 및 속성을 업데이트 하 여 반환 된 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> 유효성 검사 프로세스를 관리 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A list of the fields and properties changed by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 필드 및 속성 목록을 변경 하 여 한 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the string value of the action.
trans-unit.target: 동작의 문자열 값을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The string value of the action.
trans-unit.target: 동작의 문자열 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> is configured correctly and has no errors.
trans-unit.target: 확인 된 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> 올바로 구성 되 고 오류가 없는지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> contains errors (the Validate method returns false), then <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> will contain the list of errors encountered.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>오류가 (Validate 메서드에서 false가 반환), 다음 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>발생 한 오류 목록이 포함 됩니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> 유효성 검사 프로세스를 관리 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> had no errors; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> 오류가 없습니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.
